I agree to the terms and conditions

A survivor-activated tool 
that educates and 
prepares the person they 
will disclose to before the 
conversation takes place.

When a survivor is ready 
to disclose about their 
assault, they go onto our 
website and input the cell 
phone number and name 
of the person they will 
disclose to.

The loved one receives 
a text message from our 
site. Within the text, there 
will be a video that must 
be watched in order to 
proceed forward. Once the 
video is completed, a text 
is generated back to the 
survivor, letting them know 
the person they want to 
disclose to is ready to 
listen.
Be assured that all \nyour interactions remain \nanonymous
When it comes to anonymously \nreaching out, we have your back.
We\'ll help educate your loved ones \nso that they can be there for you.
Have an empowered conversation \nthat will bring comfort and relief.
Let\'s get started on \nyour journey of \nempowerment!
Watch the video that will be sent
Example of message that will be sent to your \nfriend or family member:
Hi [name], a friend or loved one is reaching out for support. Click here to help them: https://staging.empoweredconvo.com/ff/learn/
